title: Trevor Noah | It's Friday, Witch!
description:
President Biden met with Pope Francis in the Vatican today, police in Seattle go undercover to bust a Lego trafficking ring, and Cleveland's baseball and roller derby teams are dueling over the same name. Next, Evie graces the stage to help Stephen sort through The Late Show's first drafts of Halloween greeting cards! And later, Trevor Noah tells Stephen how making "The Daily Social Distancing Show" from home during the quarantine influenced how he approaches hosting "The Daily Show" today. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
